summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of a DDIM parallel scheduler, checking its behavior across different configurations such as noise handling, beta schedules, eta values, prediction types, variance, thresholding, timestep spacing, and inference steps to ensure correct sampling and convergence.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the DDIM parallel scheduler used in diffusionâ€‘based AI pipelines, preventing regressions and supporting robust production deployments.
